name: Fruit Salad
description:
Fruit Salad is a vibrant and nutritious dish made with a medley of fresh, juicy fruits. Perfect for a light snack, breakfast, or dessert, this salad is naturally sweet and packed with vitamins. A drizzle of honey and a sprinkle of mint elevate the flavors, making it a refreshing treat for any occasion. Serve chilled for the best taste!

🔹 Ingredients:
🍓 Strawberries
🍍 Pineapple
🍉 Watermelon
🍇 Grapes
🍊 Oranges
🍯 Honey (optional)
🌿 Fresh Mint

Description
